About.Hours & facilities: Open Thursday and Friday 10.00am-12.00 noon, 1.30pm-5.00pm. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans. Introductory brochure available costing 20c.

About.Access: At least one day's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: The Society accepts acquisitions relating to material concerning Walcha and District, and its people. These include maps, books, photographs etc, letters and documents as well as local publications such as family histories or books concerning Walcha and its people.

About.Major holdings:
Cemetery records - general cemetery and Catholic cemetery 1869-1988.
	Birth, death & marriage card index 1842-1911, some 1911-1988 (incomplete).
	Walcha News - newspapers 1950-1990 (incomplete).
